metadata.Title: CVE-2021-26691 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Apache HTTP Server versions 2.4.0 to 2.4.46 a specially crafted SessionHeader sent by an origin server could cause a heap overflow

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-26691` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

apache2 - 2.4.46-4ubuntu2
apache2-bin - 2.4.46-4ubuntu2
apache2-data - 2.4.46-4ubuntu2
apache2-suexec-custom - 2.4.46-4ubuntu2
apache2-suexec-pristine - 2.4.46-4ubuntu2
apache2-utils - 2.4.46-4ubuntu2
libapache2-mod-md - 2.4.46-4ubuntu2
libapache2-mod-proxy-uwsgi - 2.4.46-4ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apache2 package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.46-4ubuntu2').
